meanings.definition: (Latin) I made, I did, I created
meanings.english_definition: (Latin) First-person singular perfect active indicative of faciō (“I make, do, create”).

etymology.value: From the Latin verb faciō, meaning 'I make, I do'.

usage_notes.explanation: 'Feci' is a Latin verb form. It is the first-person singular perfect active indicative of the verb 'faciō'. It translates to 'I made', 'I did', or 'I created'. It is often found in historical texts or inscriptions.
